component.alias: Mi Casas Verde Vera 3, Mi Casa Verde VeraLite
component.notes:
The user based login service of this profile is for a Kwikset lock controlled by the Mi Casa Verde Vera 2, it may work for other locks (schlage) as well.
Vera 2 Setup: Go to the IP Address of the Vera 2 (192.168.81.1 default) to access the Vera2 webpage You can connect to the Vera2 through its ad hoc wireless network with network name vera_###### You will have to configure and connect Eth1 port of the Vera 2 to the network with Savant for control
Device Numbers given by the Vera 2 are used for the Security Data Tables in Blueprint This can be found on the Vera2 webpage under dashboard > devices > "wrench icon" > settings tab > Device #
Notes on z-wave pairing kwikset lock with the Vera 2 http://youtu.be/z4NlUY3quGs
1. Put vera2 into include mode, there is a wizard on the vera2 webpage 2. Bring the Vera 2 and the Kwikset lock within 3 feet of each other
--------------------KWIKSET Setup --------------- 3. Remove the battery in the kwikset lock 4. Press the large program button 3 times 5. Reinsert the battery in the kwikset lock 6. Press the upper left button on the kwikset lock
7. The lock should be recognized on the vera2 webpage --------------------SCHLAGE Setup ---------------
2. Bring the Vera 2 and the Schlage lock within 3 feet of each other 3. Put Schlage lock into enrollment mode - enter programming code 6 digits - wait for 3 lights and 3 beeps - press schlage + 0 - schlage blinking green success
------------------Add z-wave with Vera 2 Already setup ------------ 1. Go To add/Remove devices -> Zwave -> Next 2. Scroll Down to ANy Type of devices you can bring close -> Go 3. Z-Wave light will begin to blink 4. Z-Wave light flashes rapdily when the device is sucessfully added.
Blueprint Setup: Before testing this profile, verify that the locks are already on the Vera 2 z-wave network and controllable through the Vera 2 web interface. The IP address on the wire in BP should be the IP address of the Vera 2 eth1 port.
This profile will generate a user based login security service to populate some UI screen with default control and feedback. There should be a partition and a zone for each lock using the device number from the vera 2 as the address for the partition and zone number. You could however just have 1 partition per lock with no zones.
====================== Change Log ================== Version: 1.11 Change: Added CurrentPartitionArmingStatus Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Version: 1.10 Change: Added Temp Sensor Support Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Version: 1.9 Change: additional HVAC status message for tstats that have different feedback Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Version: 1.8 Change: Version Number bump to support new Savant Revisioning Scheme. Risk: Low Importance: Forced
